message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my valuation. How about $12,000?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is below its true value.  I could meet you halfway at $13,000. This is a fair offer considering the benefit it will bring you.
Alice, thank you for your response. I'm still looking for a price closer to my valuation. How about $12,500?
Bob, you're clearly serious about this product and I want to make a deal. How about we split the difference and settle at $12,750?
